Class CatClientes

  • java.lang.Object
    • CatClientes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICatClientes, java.io.Serializable

    public class CatClientes
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICatClientes, java.io.Serializable
    Classe que implementa a organização de clientes num catálogo.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
